seo.title: Positano to Sorrento by Ferry | Hostel Brikette
seo.description: Step-by-step from Positano to Sorrento by ferry: walking to the pier, tickets, boarding tips, and arrival notes for Sorrento’s Marina Piccola.

intro.title: Positano to Sorrento — Ferry
intro.body: Take a direct ferry from Positano’s Spiaggia Grande pier to Sorrento. This short guide covers walking to the pier, where to buy tickets, boarding tips, and what to expect on arrival at Sorrento’s port.

callouts.cta: Need every transport option? Open the %HOWTO:how-to-get-here|How to Get Here overview% for buses, taxis, and mixed itineraries.
